name: Weezing
description: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap.  This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball.  This ability is not disabled during roost.

abilities.name: Neutralizing Gas
abilities.description: If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

abilities.name: Misty Surge
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to misty terrain.
abilities.description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
